item.title: Zimbabwe MP dies after his car hits an elephant
item.description: Desire Moyo died a day before his 46th birthday - the four other MPs in the car have been taken to hospital.

item.title: My one-month-old grandson was killed by police tear gas
item.description: Counting the cost of deadly Gen Z protests in Madagascar where most young people are unemployed.

item.title: Burkina Faso refuses to take deportees as US stops issuing visas
item.description: The West African nation's foreign minister asks if the decision led to the US suspending issuing visas.

item.title: Afghanistan accuses Pakistan of 'violating sovereign territory'
item.description: The allegation by the Taliban came after two loud blasts were heard in the city late on Thursday.

item.title: Suspected jihadist drone plot against Belgian PM foiled
item.description: Police officers question two people and find a suspected improvised explosive device at one of the suspect's homes.
